questions.question: Kydon Group has a drug-free workplace policy.
questions.explanation: Kydon Group prohibits drug and alcohol use during work hours and on its premises, emphasizing the importance of a drug-free workplace.

questions.question: Select the types of leave available to Kydon Group employees.
questions.explanation: Kydon Group employees are entitled to Annual Leave, Medical Leave, and Paternity Leave. There is no mention of a formal Vacation Leave policy in the handbook.

questions.question: How many days of compassionate leave does a full-time employee receive?
questions.explanation: Full-time employees are entitled to 3 consecutive working days of paid compassionate leave for immediate family deaths.

questions.question: Employees are allowed to disclose confidential information after their employment ends.
questions.explanation: Employees must not disclose confidential information during or after employment, maintaining the company's trust and security.

questions.question: Which of the following are considered employee benefits at Kydon Group?
questions.explanation: Kydon Group offers benefits such as KydonCare, flexible work arrangements, and a referral bonus program. Stock options are not mentioned as part of the benefits.

questions.question: What is the review frequency for performance appraisals at Kydon Group?
questions.explanation: Performance appraisals occur annually in January, providing a structured way to evaluate employee performance.

questions.question: New employees at Kydon Group have an immediate confirmation of employment.
questions.explanation: New employees must complete a 3-month probationary period before their employment is confirmed, during which leave entitlements do not apply.

questions.question: Select the key values upheld by Kydon Group.
questions.explanation: Kydon Group's core values include Integrity, Innovation, and Sustainability, while 'Dishonesty' is not aligned with the company's values.

questions.question: What happens if an employee abandons their job at Kydon Group?
options: They may be terminated without benefits
questions.answer: They may be terminated without benefits
questions.explanation: Job abandonment may lead to termination without benefits, as outlined in the cessation of employment policy.

questions.question: Maternity leave includes 8 weeks of paid leave at Kydon Group.
questions.explanation: Female employees with more than 3 months of service are eligible for 12 weeks of maternity leave, which includes 8 weeks of paid leave.
